name: American Muscle Car Racing
description:
Special muscle cars, exiting tracks, strong competitors!
Trust your imagination, reveal your talents.
Boost your car as you win, fight strong competitions.
There is no rule here as you will set the rules.

Build your driving license,
Set up your sponsors,
Improve your car,
Strengthen the engine, change the suspensions and add turbo,
Enter the rank and win more!

Join the secret world of American Muscles!

FOR ALL YOUR QUESTIONS AND COMMENTS:
www.optogames.com
support@optogames.com
